conclusion: Determine the maximum power consumed by the external resistor R using given parameters.
Induced EMF in the coil is calculated using Faraday's Law of Induction.
Magnetic flux through the coil is calculated using the formula Phi = B * A.
The graph shows the variation of magnetic induction over time.
Rate of change of the magnetic field is calculated as 0.05 T/s from the graph.
Rate of change of the magnetic flux is calculated as 0.05 Wb/s.
Induced EMF is calculated as 10 V.
Total resistance in the circuit is calculated as 60 Ohms.
Current in the circuit is calculated as 1/6 A.
Power consumed by the external resistor R is calculated as approximately 1.39 W.
The maximum power consumed by the external resistor R is approximately 1.39 W.
